title: 112_s1527
content: Authorizes the award of a single Congressional Gold Medal to collectively honor the Montford Point Marines, US Marine Corps, in recognition of their service during World War II. Provides for the Medal's display at the Smithsonian Institution. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Medal should be made available for display elsewhere, particularly at locations associated with the Montford Point Marines. Permits the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell duplicates in bronze of the gold medal, at a price sufficient to cover the costs of the medals.
